messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I wish some fishing-loving lady’d come
along. But no, it’s all just Trainers.
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Sure, so I lost.
But I’ll keep on fishing.
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
If you know of any ladies that like
fishing, help me reel ’em in!
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
Umm... Yeah. Weren’t you that person
who preferred Pokémon over fishing?
